title: Milad Rabbani
text:
Milad Rabbani () is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a> who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Esteghlal%20Ahvaz">Esteghlal Ahvaz</a> in the <a href="Iran%20Pro%20League">Iran Pro League</a>.
Club career.
Rabbani started his career with <a href="Esteghlal%20Ahvaz">Esteghlal Ahvaz</a> from youth levels. He was promoted to first team after relegation to <a href="Iran%20Football%27s%202nd%20Division">Division 2</a> in 2011. He was a regular starter in his first season with <a href="Esteghlal%20Ahvaz">Esteghlal Ahvaz</a> while he helped them to promoting to <a href="Azadegan%20League">Division 1</a>. As summer 2014 he joined to <a href="Esteghlal%20Khuzestan">Esteghlal Khuzestan</a> with a 3 years contract. He made his debut for <a href="Esteghlal%20Khuzestan">Esteghlal Khuzestan</a> as 31 October 2014 against <a href="Sepahan%20F.C.">Sepahan</a> as a starter.
